page.title: 14S'gate/The Green cont'd
page.content: {Christ Church: There are church services all week. The earliest is on Tuesday at 7.30am. After some services you can have coffee. Probably the best attended service is the Sunday l0.00am service. About 1-2% of the community attend the church. The church has three choirs. The main choir, the boys and the ladies choir. Practises are on Monday, Wednesday and Friday nights. Christ Church has 10 bells unlike most churches which have 8. Christ Church was designed by Sir Giles Gilbert Scott.
